name: CBC
0:
”Alexa, ask CBC to play Radio One Sudbury”
”Alexa, ask CBC for today's news.”
”Alexa, ask CBC to play CBC Music”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. b. c.
Developer Terms of Use
des: You can ask your CBC skill to play your local CBC Radio 1 station, or any of the 37 local Radio 1 stations from across Canada. You can also ask to play CBC Music, or the latest news.
